attributes.action: we would like the prime minister to stop the extadition of gary mckinnin to the u.s.a.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
we think the prime minister should step in and order the extradition to the u.s of gary mckinnon to be halted with immediate effect.
he should stand up for british people when things are not correct and not be so cowerdly as to alow the u.s.a to steamroller over the british people and laws.

rejection.details: We can not accept petitions about individual legal cases. The Home Secretary does not have general discretion in this case. He can only stop extradition if he finds that McKinnon’s human rights would be breached.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
